data.eml:eml: Two new species of Coryogalops (Perciformes: Gobiidae) from the Red Sea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kovačić, Marcelo, Bogorodsky, Sergey V., Mal, Ahmad O. (2014): Two new species of Coryogalops (Perciformes: Gobiidae) from the Red Sea. Zootaxa 3881 (6): 513-531, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3881.6.2
